CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 18, 1962, pg. 1 reads: "All-Night Gospel Sing For Drafts Fund- Larry Shannon, 13-year-old gospel singer, is shown as he spiritually rocked the crowd of about 1,500 persons attending the all-night gospel sing which began Friday at 10p.m. at Calvary Baptist Church, Wylie Ave., Pittsburgh."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Larry Shannon holding microphone and singing in Calvary Baptist Church for All Night Gospel Sing for the Charles "Buggsy" Drafts Fund
